Name: Sync
Overview: BitTorrent Sync, or simply - Sync - is an application for data synchronization. Its primary goal is to keep designated folder content same on 2 or more devices / computers. As soon as something changes on one computer, change (would it be changed content of a file, file renaming or deletion, etc.) should be propagated to all other computer(s) that want to keep the folder synchronized. Sync is available for a bunch of platforms, both desktop and mobile, which gives a good usage flexibility.
ModeratorComment: Suggested to switch to Resilio Sync

Web Interface Port.Name: Web Interface Port
Web Interface Port.Description: This is Sync's Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

TCP Data Transfer Port.Name: TCP Data Transfer Port
TCP Data Transfer Port.Description: This is Sync's TCP port for data transfers.

UDP Data Transfer Port.Name: UDP Data Transfer Port
UDP Data Transfer Port.Description: This is Sync's UDP port for data transfers.

Config Storage Path.Name: Config Storage Path
Config Storage Path.Description: This is where Sync will store its databases and configuration.
